name: 2 for 2 Dots Connect 2048
description:
2 for 2 Connect Dots 2048 is a super casual puzzle number connection game! You will absolutely get addicted to this 2 for 2048 puzzle game. 

Once started, It is difficult to end! Try to get as higher score as you can!

How to play:
Connect the same numbers and watch them combine to a bigger number. DON’T run out of moves!

Make lines by connecting as many same numbered dots as you can. The longer the line, the more points you get and the longer you’ll survive in this 2 for 2048 game. 

Highlights:
◉ Slide the number up, down, left, right, in any of the four directions.
◉ Search and connect two same numbers as a start.
◉ Only the same numbers can be connected.
◉ The result is a multiple of all connected numbers sum.
◉ The score is the sum of all connected numbers.
◉ The game ends when there is no connectable number.

Download and get addicted with 2 for 2 Connect Dots 2048!
